snippet: The Obama administration will not allow Mississippi to run its own health insurance exchange because of a disagreement between the state’s governor and insurance commissioner.
abstract: Obama administration will not allow Mississippi to run its own health insurance exchange because of a disagreement between Gov Phil Bryant and Mike Chaney, state's insurance commissioner.
lead_paragraph: The Obama administration will not allow Mississippi to run its own health insurance exchange because of a disagreement between the state’s governor and insurance commissioner.

headline.main: Mississippi: State Health Exchange Is Disallowed
headline.print_headline: Mississippi: State Health Exchange Is Disallowed

keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
